creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
description: unsigned; many different scenes with people sitting in small groups inside of buildings, on verandahs, or standing near trees outside; scenes separated by silver clouds: people sitting on and inside a building doing calligraphy; woman inside room looking at a river; men and women outside near trees; scholars seated near rocks; men near a carriage pulled by a black ox, etc.
medium: Ink and color on silver leafed paper
object_name: Six-panel folding screen, one of a pair (left)
title: Scenes from the Tale of Genji on Silver Ground
